name: Faire du Vélo
description:
A Kraftwerk inspired game based on their soundtrack album "Tour de France."

Faire du Vélo is a 3D, open-world cycling action game that takes place in a pearly and ivory metropolitan city where the player decides whether they should take the high road of morale upheaval or the road of pure societal decadence.

Check out our Twitter page as we progress through development:

https://twitter.com/Faire_du_Velo_

Here is also a brief outline of what the game was about also:

http://www.twitlonger.com/show/n_1spe2d0
